comments: She is great! You know exactly what you will be tested and when we all didnt do super well on the first test she let has resubmit answers. There are in class quizzes every class but they arent too hard if you study flashcards and she ends up dropping a couple. She sounded WAY better than the other guy who teaches this class!

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: This professor was honestly one of the worst I\'ve ever had. She is not mean, she just does not know what she is talking about. She reads from her slides. She is not very confident. The class is ridiculously easy though, you can pass without hardly trying. The level of group work is nauseating, and the activities don\'t teach you.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Easiest Biology class ever. If you\'re looking for an easy A, take Ostraff for BIO 100. Final is made up of a bunch of easy writing assignments throughout the semester, and the tests are easy. Great class to take if you\'re trying to knock out a GE and boost your GPA. Class itself is kind of boring, but the easiness of it makes up for it.

comments: Honestly she is a real nice lady but the class is extremely boring and has long lectures filled with information that mostly is not on the tests. Assigns lots of random readings as well that are not tested on.

comments: Great class. This is what I hope for all generals at BYU. Gave a good overall grasp on biology in the world and how I fit into that. She opened my eyes to both sides of several arguments and really helped me see how biology is prevalent.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: The class is very insightful. Although the lectures can be long, I found the class very educational and focused on the problems in the world today. I left feeling like I have a better understanding on biology and how I fit into the overall scheme of the world. And the tests/assignments aren\'t too tough!

stu_tags: SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  LECTURE HEAVY  PARTICIPATION MATTERS
comments: Dr. Ostraff is an incredible person. She knows her stuff. Expect many portfolios, which are papers about an assigned subject. Not difficult. Attend the TA reviews for the exams and you will easily get an A. The final is a paper/project. The class is often run by the TAs because Dr. Ostraff lives forever away.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Rarely really heard the teacher teach. Did not learn much about Biology. Tests were fair, project was fair. I really wish I could have learned about Biology. EXTREMELY boring.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Sis. Ostraff seems very nice; however, her class is boring. The TAs taught more than she does. The class was an easy A: go to class, because rush writes are given everyday. Before tests, go to TA reviews and they will tell you EVERYTHING you need to know, and after, go over it with them and you\'ll get half the points back. Don\'t bother reading.

stu_tags: EXTRA CREDIT  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.
comments: Sister Ostraff is an amazing professor. She is very passionate about biology and shares many real-life examples. She takes time out of class for us to do a fun activity which relates to her lectures. The tests are very basic, which is fitting because it\'s a 100 class. There is a "rush write" each class and you have to go if you want the points.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Sooo boring but so easy. She seems like a nice person, but her lectures are read from the slide and I don\'t feel like I learned much else from my High School Bio class. Easy A though, if you want that. You have to go to class because she has rush writes for points everyday. I didn\'t even buy a textbook and I got an A.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I did not like this class one bit. The lectures were very long and she didn\'t really keep people interested. I didn\'t feel like I learned anything. You have to complete papers weekly that are busy work and often very confusing. Its an ok class for a general but I would not want to take it again.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Easy class to get an A in if you\'re just looking to get a GE done. But if you want to learn something? Forget it. Lectures are read, confusing and dull. Daily quizzes are worded horribly. Class was very disorganized. That being said, if you do the essays (follow the rubrics), and go to test reviews. it\'s an easy A. Final is a take home essay.

comments: Honestly? One of the worst classes I\'ve ever taken at BYU. Not even worth the painfully dull lectures that she mangles every class period. Awful communication + ambiguous daily quizzes make this class beyond awful. Don\'t take it.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: she was great. I learned so much from her class. the tests and quizzes were reasonably easy but made me think. i would take this class over if i could

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She has the TA\'s teach a lot of the classes, and takes daily quizzes which are for the most part easy, but most of the time there is one out of the five that are somewhat of a trick question. Lectures are pretty interesting (for bio) and the TA\'s grade the 1 page papers pretty leniently. 1 hardish midterm and an easy final.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: She\'s nice, but has the most boring lectures. You only have 1 test after you learn basic bio. After that it\'s all about plants, but there\'s no test for it. Our final is a 1 pg paper. We took quizzes every day at the start of class. We had a few short 1-2 pg papers throughout the semester, super easy. Just do it and you\'ll easily get an A.

tag_professor: LECTURE HEAVY (6)  EXTRA CREDIT (5)  GROUP PROJECTS (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (2)  Clear grading criteria (2)  Participation matters (2)  Get ready to read (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Boring lectures, but easy class. TA\'s were super helpful. She\'s a nice professor, but if you want to actually learn about biology, I\'d take from someone else. If you want an easy good grade, take from her.
